title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 447 of 2020)), in exercise of the
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Occupational Pension Schemes
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Occupational Pension Schemes 

(Revaluation) Regulations 2024. 

Rate of Revaluation of Preserved Benefit

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 447 of 2020)), in exercise of the
heading: In accordance with Section 33 of the Pensions Act there shall be a 4%
text_raw:
2. 

In accordance with Section 33 of the Pensions Act there shall be a 4% 

revaluation of preserved benefits for 2023. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 March, 2024. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 29th March, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [124] 3

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 447 of 2020)), in exercise of the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide for changes in the percentage by which the amount 
of a preserved benefit is to be increased or decreased in a specified year. 

There shall be a 4% revaluation of preserved benefits under section 33 of the 
Pensions Act 1990 for 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [124]
